name: Where is Adan
description:
"Where is Adan "is an interactive game, including a structure in the data on the engine island" toma_001"-- in some real fixed event will happen during this period, 

several unknown random fragments, its essence is the core of the author to her data in this engine, and then all he can pass the file to get to know, to avoid social death. 

A record of events that can be excavated is a relic of the post-internet era. 

(It's also a social experiment against fixed thinking, about automated events and simulated evolution, and about the deception of collective memory.)

Time serves as the player's blood bar, which will resurrect the time. As "engine time" passes, we will experience the afterglow of being offline with all our data artifacts.

How to play：Press Q to plant trees and hope to have fun
